quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“order”（命令）或词根联想“ordinary”（普通），将“ordain”误判为“命令”或“使普通”。
quiz_item.sentence: The church announced that the bishop will **ordain** five new deacons at the upcoming ceremony.

option.definition: to officially appoint someone as a priest or minister
to give a command or instruction
to make something ordinary or common
to arrange something in a particular way
